entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 9:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
